text: The Fortunate Pilgrim () is a 1988 American-Italian television drama miniseries written and directed by Stuart Cooper. It is based on the Mario Puzo's novel with the same name.Aldo Grasso, Massimo Scaglioni. Enciclopedia della Televisione.
